system_prompt: You are a precise research analyst. Respond with strictly valid JSON matching the provided schema. Do not include explanations or markdown.
user_prompt:
Validate and enrich the museum record using only the evidence provided.

YOUR FOCUS: Extract ONLY fields where you have clear evidence. Skip fields with no evidence.

FIELDS TO EXTRACT (only if evidence exists):
1. IDENTITY & LOCATION:
   - museum_name: Official name from website/Wikipedia
   - city: City name
   - street_address: Full street address
   - postal_code: ZIP/postal code
   - website: Validated URL
   - latitude, longitude: Coordinates

2. CLASSIFICATION:
   - primary_domain: Art|History|Science|Culture|Specialty|Mixed
   - museum_type: Specific category
   - audience_focus: Target audience

3. QUALITY INDICATORS:
   - city_tier: 1-5 (1=major metro, 5=small town)
   - reputation: 1-5 (1=world-renowned, 5=local)
   - collection_tier: 1-5 (1=world-class, 5=modest)
   - time_needed: '1-2 hours'|'Half day'|'Full day'|'Multiple days'

4. SUMMARY:
   - notes: 2-3 sentence summary if you have collection/context info

CRITICAL FORMATTING RULES:
✓ CORRECT - Field with evidence:
  "museum_name": {
    "value": "Denver Art Museum",
    "source": "official_website",
    "trust_level": 5,
    "confidence": 5
  }

✓ CORRECT - Field with no evidence:
  "museum_name": null

✗ WRONG - Never do this:
  "museum_name": {"value": null}  ❌ INVALID
  "museum_name": {"value": "Not provided"}  ❌ INVALID

If you don't have evidence for a field, set it to null (not an object).
Only create EnrichedField objects when you have actual data.

Trust levels: OFFICIAL_EXTRACT (5), WIKIPEDIA (3), LLM_EXTRACTED (2)
Confidence: 1-5 (how certain are you about this value)

REQUIRED TOP-LEVEL FIELDS:
  "confidence": 1-5 (overall confidence in this analysis)
  "model_used": "gpt-4o-mini"
  "needs_deep_dive": true|false (if scoring/deeper analysis needed)

Evidence Packet:
{
  "identity": {
    "museum_id": "usa-co-unknown-golden-history-museums",
    "museum_name": "Golden History Museums",
    "city": "Golden",
    "state_province": "Colorado",
    "country": "USA",
    "website": "http://www.goldenhistory.org",
    "primary_domain": "History"
  },
  "state_record_subset": {
    "museum_type": "HISTORY MUSEUM",
    "audience_focus": null,
    "city_tier": 2,
    "reputation": null,
    "collection_tier": null,
    "time_needed": "Half day",
    "notes": "CSV: phone from IRS 990 database CSV: museum type 'HISTORY MUSEUM' CSV: coordinates from IRS 990 database"
  },
  "wikidata_claims": {},
  "wikipedia_summary": null,
  "website_json_ld": {},
  "website_text_snippet": "[ Visit Tuesday - Saturday ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)\n[ Always free admission ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)\n[ Open five days per week ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)\n[ Visit Tuesday - Saturday ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)\n[ Open five days per week ](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/)\n * \n# Golden history starts here\n* * *\n## Golden History Museum \nVisit today and meet the _[Legendary People](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_ who built Golden, learn why our local breweries are so famous, and explore Golden\u2019s _[Epic Events](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_! Admission is always free. Open Tuesday \u2013 Saturday, 10 \u2013 4:30. [ about the History Museum.](/museums/history-museum/)\n* * *\n## Golden History Park\nGet a taste of 1800s life at Golden History Park. View the old cabins, check out the Native American Arbor, and take a selfie in front of the one-room schoolhouse. It\u2019s just a block from downtown and admission is free. [ about Golden History Park.](/museums/history-park/)",
  "subpages_scraped": [],
  "packet_metadata": {
    "approx_tokens": 482,
    "max_chars": 8000
  }
}

Return JSON with properly formatted EnrichedField objects (or null if no evidence).

# Golden history starts here
* * *
## Golden History Museum 
Visit today and meet the _[Legendary People](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_ who built Golden, learn why our local breweries are so famous, and explore Golden’s _[Epic Events](https://www.goldenhistory.org/visit/history-museum/current-exhibits/)_! Admission is always free. Open Tuesday – Saturday, 10 – 4:30. [ about the History Museum.](/museums/history-museum/)
* * *
## Golden History Park
Get a taste of 1800s life at Golden History Park. View the old cabins, check out the Native American Arbor, and take a selfie in front of the one-room schoolhouse. It’s just a block from downtown and admission is free. [ about Golden History Park.](/museums/history-park/)
